author: SteveL-MSFT
body: Based on discussion from https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/4761 we should ensure consistent line endings (LF on the repository side) and encodings (ASCII).  Since this touches many files, we'll do this after 6.0.0 is final and before work on 6.1.0 starts.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: Due to the change in .gitattributes to force auto eol correction, it was showing incorrect files as modified when doing a fetch/pull/clone.  So to avoid the confusion, I force changed all EOL to LF as part of https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/4943 and https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/4956

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: I believe this is already done

title: Convert all files to ASCII encoding
